Jennifer R. Sredzinski age 41 of Monroe died Friday, August 29, 2014 at 
Bridgeport Hospital. Born in Niagara Falls, NY on January 16, 1973, she was 
the daughter of Dominic and Marilyn McInnis Bilotta of Niagara Falls, NY. 
Ms. Sredzinski worked as a 9-1-1 Operator and Public Safety Dispatcher with 
the Southwestern Regional Emergency Communications System “CMED” for nearly 
20 years.

Funeral services are set for Tuesday, Sept. 2 for the Monroe woman who was 
beaten on Monday, Aug. 25. Jennifer Sredzinski, 41, of Windgate Circle, 
Monroe, died on Friday Aug. 29 as a result of her injuries.

According to police, the Monroe Police Department received a 911 call for 
an unconscious female lying in the roadway on Windgate Circle, bleeding 
from her head. Sredzinski received emergency medical care on scene and was 
transported to Bridgeport Hospital for treatment. She died four days later. 
The case is being investigated as an untimely death under suspicious 
circumstances.﻿

Q: How does he know the school's in lockdown?
A: The school is being shot up. It is standard procedure that the school 
will go straight into lockdown in this situation.

Q:How did the 911 Operator know it was the Front Parking Lot?
A: Again, Common Sense! If someone is shooting up a school, it's first 
instinct that they came in through the front entrance, hence, Front Parking 
Lot.

Q: How could the custodian tell that the front glass broke out when he's in 
another part?
A: Breaking Glass and Gunshots are very loud, he probably knows were the 
front of the school is.

Q: "The shooting is Fake?"
A: There are tens to hundreds of false 911 calls everyday, Some talking 
about bombings, shootings, and hostage situations, it's common to think 
that a 911 Call about a School Shooting is Fake.
A2: The usual response in that time of a call is to ask if the caller is in 
a safe room, and mostly, is he safe from what's going on. It sounds like 
"are you in a room? Are you safe?" It's common procedure.﻿

1. Did you ever tell a lie in your life? If you have that makes you a liar. 
God says no liar will inherit the Kingdom of God. Liars shall have their 
place in the Lake of Fire on Judgment Day. Those aren't MY words. They're 
Biblical. 

2. Have you ever looked on a woman with lust? If you have, that makes you 
an adulterer at heart. The Bible says that a man who looks at a woman with 
lust has committed adultery with her already in his heart. Adulterers are 
another group of people who won't inherit the Kingdom of God. 

3. Have you ever stolen anything? Doesn't have to be big things. It can be 
as small as a pack of gum from your local 7-11. If you have, that makes you 
a thief. Thieves will not inherit God's Kingdom either. 

Now for one more question: 

4. Have you ever used God's name in vain? Basically, using God's name in an 
irreverent, impious, or to swear is using His name in vain. If you have, 
then that makes you a blasphemer. 

So, by doing all four of these things that makes you: a liar, an adulterer, 
a thief, and a blasphemer. None of these four things are good in God's 
eyes. The world would tell you that you were alright if you had done these 
things. God won't, however, and His judgment is what matters. The truth is, 
that all of us have done these things at some point, and yes I include 
myself in that group too. So, are we still good people when we compare our 
actions to God's Law? No, no we are not. At least, not by HIS standards. So 
what then do we do? How do we escape God's judgment and wrath for these 
things? Sit back, and I'll tell you. 

You see, God doesn't want you to remain in this condition. No, seriously, 
He doesn't. How can you be free of these things that plague your life? 
Well, long time ago, Jesus Christ, God's only begotten Son, was beaten, 
mocked, spit on, and at the culmination of all these things, He was slain 
and crucified on a cross at a place called Golgotha, or "The place of a 
skull." Jesus was crucified for US. That's right, He was crucified for 
PEOPLE. ALL people throughout ALL time from then until now until the end of 
all time, which is coming soon.

At the end of His relatively short life on Earth, He was crucified, buried, 
and on the 3rd day after His burial, He was resurrected and was victorious 
over death, Hell, and the grave, and now all who will receive His gift of 
salvation can be free from wrath and judgment. Believe on the Lord Jesus 
Christ and you shall be saved. This is the Good News of the Gospel of Jesus 
Christ. Have a wonderful day.

There are some other things I need to tell you. If you decide to ask Jesus 
Christ to save you, you should know that you will not get everything you 
want. You WILL, however, get what you NEED. You will still make mistakes 
every now and then. Mistakes are a part of life. It comes with our 
imperfect nature. It won't be easy by any stretch of the imagination. It 
will be difficult. You will face persecution if you choose Jesus, but if 
you choose Jesus, the end result will be far greater than anything you have 
or will face down here on this Earth. I hope you will make the right 
choice."

Ok, so now that is the message that someone else wrote and i asked if i 
could copy and paste it and also put it in the comments section of various 
youtube videos. Now for my own personal thoughts. I have only been reading 
the Bible for about 7 years.Now i would not say my life has gotten any " 
better" in that time. Afterall, God does not promise our life will get 
better in this lifetime if we believe in Him . If it did we would all be 
believers and faith would not be needed. The Bible is about having faith. 
There have been however several significant changes in my life that have 
occurred since i started reading and understanding what i was reading. I 
became humble. I became compassionate for other people .Even people like 
you whom i have never met. I pray each and every day for the people that do 
not know God. I pray for the unrepentant sinner because i wonder what will 
they say when they die and finally meet God and if God asks them Why should 
I let you into my Heavenly Kingdom when your whole life you ignored my Word 
or did not believe in Me ? I wonder what excuse could possibly be given to 
God that He has not already heard millions of times over. Again, my name is 
Bryan, i am here to help anyone get started with their relationship with 
Christ. Don't be that person that says to God " well if only someone had 
told me about you i might have listened". Your time to start reading the 
Bible and listening to God's word starts now. Understanding God's word has 
helped me immensely in my life. His Word has taken away my anger, my fear- 
etc and has replaced it with boldness in my faith ,wisdom and the courage 
to tell anyone that i know that i believe in Jesus as my Savior knowing 
full well i will be laughed at ridiculed and talked about behind my back. 
It does not matter , i know what will happen in the end. I hope you do too. 
If not begin your relationship with Jesus. One more thing, people ask me 
why do i care about people i have never met ? The answer to that is that i 
have read the Bible and listened to 1000's of sermons from various pastors 
and preachers so therefore i have God's Holy Spirit in me and with that 
comes wisdom. People tell me they would rather be in hell than Heaven 
because they think hell is going to be one big great party place. They say 
they will be able to do whatever they want and not have someone tell them 
it is wrong and in their mind that is great. If you are one of those people 
you are so misinformed. The Bible teaches that hell is a place of torment 
and torture. You will not see your friends in this place . Your eternity 
will be filled with agony and regret. It is because of the compassion that 
God has given me that has inspired me to give you this truthful warning. I 
only post this message on videos where it is obvious that the people 
viewing such videos do not have God in their life. Please allow God to come 
into your life today. May God bless you 
Sincerely, Bryan. Thank you for reading.﻿
